nmrglue.process.proc_lp.find_coeff¶

nmrglue.process.proc_lp.find_coeff(poles, mode='f')¶

Find LP coefficients from a set of LP roots (poles)

Parmeters:

poles Array of LP roots mode “f” or “b”
